review.title: “Very disappointing.”
review.pros: Pros – I decided to accept a job offer from K-Var Corporation because their Sales Rep / Telemarketing position matches my skills and interests. The salary was commensurate with the required responsibilities, and they work a very ideal schedule.
review.cons: Cons – The Genreal Manager (who hires the telemarketers), has never made a sales call and therefore has no clue as to how to properly train and advise new-hires. He is very demanding and unsupportive. He expects strong results without having to take a hand in the development of his people.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Lead by example. If you're going to set a high sales-expectation for others, you should first demonstrate how it's achieved yourself. You provided no leadership and I suspect it's because you don't have the courage to emerge from your sequestered office in the warehouse. I don't think you could make a success of telemarketing the company's products if your life depended upon it.
